Package user

Class CampCommittee

  • Object
    • User
      • Student
        • CampCommittee
  • public class CampCommittee
extends Student
    Represents a Camp Commitee member in the system. A Camp Committee member has more power than a Student, and can generate reports, and contains a points variable.
    Since:
    2023-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Soo Qi Yang, Teo Kai Xuan, Masagca Merwyn Louie Dumasis, Nguyen Phuong Linh, Tee Jeeng Yee

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private String campName  
      private int points  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CampCommittee​(Student student, String campName)
      Generates a new Camp Committee object from an existing student object.

      Adds points to this Camp Commiteee object.

      Gets this Camp Committee's camp name that he is a camp committee of.

      Gets this Camp Committee's points.

    • Field Detail

      • points

        private int points

      • campName

        private String campName

    • Constructor Detail

      • CampCommittee

        public CampCommittee​(Student student,
                     String campName)
        Generates a new Camp Committee object from an existing student object. This is usually called when a student registers to be a camp committee member for a camp.
        Parameters:
        student - The student object to be promoted.
        campName - The camp name that the student will be a camp committee member of.

    • Method Detail

      • getCampName

        public String getCampName()
        Gets this Camp Committee's camp name that he is a camp committee of.
        Returns:
        The name of the camp that this Camp Committee object is a camp committee member of.

      • addPoints

        public void addPoints()
        Adds points to this Camp Commiteee object. Usually called by user database when this Camp Committee member successfully gets a suggestion accepted, or successfully replies an enquiry, or successfully gives a suggestion.

      • getPoints

        public int getPoints()
        Gets this Camp Committee's points.
        Returns:
        This Camp Commitee's points.
